name: PENNSYLVANIA HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION, On Behalf of Brian C. DAVIS, Appellant, v. ROBERT H. WISE MANAGEMENT and Gypsy Lane Owners Association, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania Human Relations Commission v. Robert H. Wise Management

parties: PENNSYLVANIA HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION, On Behalf of Brian C. DAVIS, Appellant, v. ROBERT H. WISE MANAGEMENT and Gypsy Lane Owners Association, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of December, 2004, the Order of Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED and the motion to strike the name Robert Wise Management from the caption is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
863 A.2d 535
PENNSYLVANIA HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION, On Behalf of Brian C. DAVIS, Appellant, v. ROBERT H. WISE MANAGEMENT and Gypsy Lane Owners Association, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 22, 2004.
